casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Bardo Garcia LUGO. No. 409P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 11, 2008. M. Gordon Widenhouse, Jr., Chapel Hill, for Lugo.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of October 2008 by State of NC for extension of time to file response to Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of December 2008."
